name: ARTIYO
description: Artiyo is a platform where all creative people and creative companies can share, inspire and collaborate their work

team.name: uday singh
team.bioHtml: Founder @ARTIYO • Worked at @Cisco, @Starbucks Coffee Company

jobs.title: Technical Co-founder (CTO)
jobs.description:
What we are looking for

You must be crazy and passionate towards art and technology
You must have past experience showcasing entrepreneurial drive
Organizational and analytical skills
Experience building technical architecture for web/mobile applications from zero
Experience with agile systems development methodologies
Experience with programming languages such as Java, PHP, Python, or C++

Compensation : Equity only | No Salary (Well, We are bootstrapped!)
